__e: Eliot, John Croton tells me you still haven't turned anything in on the day-care crisis.
Isn't he the one involved in the medicines scandal?
It would be, if it wasn't for Larry's grave-robbing scandal or his murder.
I have found a way to put your father's scandal behind you.
After your performance the other night, I can't believe I'm even giving you a warning.
And now I have found a way to put your father's scandal behind you...
Five years ago, that illegal bid on government construction.
The reason that I'm not furious at your mother is that I wouldn't have missed the fire you lit under Burning Oak for anything.
- If I ever meet her face-to-face, I'll raise such a scandal!
When I was 16, my father had an affair, caused quite a scandal at our church.
Okay, but if... if the fight wasn't about a sex scandal, then what was it?
This is a different job than the other one I quit, and I did it because there was a sex scandal in my office.
- I've been so preoccupied with my sex scandal, I hadn't noticed.
I'm handing you a tabloid murder case, and no one wants to sit with me at the table?
If you don't talk to me, I'll make a scene, and everyone will know.
and, "oh, my goodness, something needs to be done."
